THE SPIDERS' WEB

OMORROW a green, inexperienced Blue Jay eleven will trot
out on the turf of Homewood Field to face the highly touted
Richmond team. With only five regulars back from last season and a hard schedule in the offing, Dr. Ray Van Orman faces one
of the most difficult problems of his football coaching power. It is
an easy enough task to whip' into shape a winning team when experienced men are available, but to mould a strong outfit from a
crowd of raw recruits is an entirely different matter.
After holding the strong V. M. I. to a 6 to 6 tie, the Spiders will
invade Homewood, filled with confidence. The experts, who, pretend In know all about such'things, faxor the. Virginians to win by
several touchdowns. But the Jay outfit will fight every inch of the

THE SPIDERS' WEB

OMORROW a green, inexperienced Blue Jay eleven will trot
out on the turf of Homewood Field to face the highly touted
Richmond team. With only five regulars back from last season and a hard schedule in the offing, Dr. Ray Van Orman faces one
of the most difficult problems of his football coaching power. It is
an easy enough task to whip' into shape a winning team when experienced men are available, but to mould a strong outfit from a
crowd of raw recruits is an entirely different matter.
After holding the strong V. M. I. to a 6 to 6 tie, the Spiders will
invade Homewood, filled with confidence. The experts, who, pretend In know all about such'things, faxor the. Virginians to win by
several touchdowns. But the Jay outfit will fight every inch of the
way and will exhibit the same indomitable spirit Which has characterized former Hopkins elevens.
At a time such as this, it is the cheering section which may win
or lose the battle. With a peppy, enthusiastic crowd of rooters in
the grandstand and a fighting team on the field, Richmond will face
